Changes:
- Removed VITE_MAPS_KEY from onRequest secrets declaration (only GEMINI_API_KEY needed)
- Commented out unused /getPlaceDetails backend endpoint (frontend uses Maps JS SDK directly)
- Removed unused @googlemaps imports
- Updated version comment to V12

This fixes the 500 errors shown in browser console. The Cloud Function now only requires GEMINI_API_KEY from Secret Manager.
